text: A "Lam Lai" () refers to a presiding tutelary deity of a particular region, especially village, in Meitei religion and mythology.The Manipuri Lais The feminine form of the "Lam Lai" is "Lam Leima". ==Related pages== * Lai Haraoba * Umang Lai * Lainingthou * Lairembi * Hingchabi == References == == Other websites == Category:Meitei gods and goddesses
title: Lam Lai
